      • model.hand.analyzer.SimpleAnalyzer

    HandAnalyzerInterface

    public class SimpleAnalyzer
extends HandAnalyzer

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleAnalyzer

        public SimpleAnalyzer(java.util.List<Card> fullHand)
        Creates an instance of HandAnalyzer by calling the super constructor.

        Converts fullHand into its Ranks and stores it in this.bestHand. The SimpleAnalyzer can be used to check its top rank without calling super.analyze, but this method is required for performing analysis about pairRanks, fullHouseRanks, and bestHand.

        Parameters:
        fullHand - a hand to analyze
        Requires:
        |fullHand| = 5
        Ensures:
        the client can access getTopRank

    • Method Detail

      • fiveCardCombinations

        public final java.util.List<java.util.List<Card>> fiveCardCombinations(java.util.List<Card> fullHand)
        The list of all the five Card hands in fullHand.

        This method is optional when implementing this interface.

        This method is not need for a Simple Analyzer and thus is not correctly implemented.

        DON'T CALL THIS METHOD!

        Parameters:
        fullHand - the full list of cards to analyze
        Returns:
        all the five card hand combinations

      • analyze

        public final void analyze()
        Analyzes the hand, essentially the main method. THIS METHOD IS REQUIRED TO BE CALLED BEFORE ACESSING ANY DATA FROM this. This method is not required to check the top rank of this, but is necessary for accessing any other information.
        Specified by:
        analyze in interface HandAnalyzerInterface
        Overrides:
        analyze in class HandAnalyzer
